dcatapchr 0.0.0.3

Create a dcat:byteSize property in DCAT-AP CH standard

dcat_byteSize.Rd

Create a dcat:byteSize property in DCAT-AP CH standard

Usage

dcat_byteSize(size = 0)

Arguments

size

size of the resource (in bytes)

Property of dcat:Distribution (dcat_distribution())

Examples

# Size (in bytes) of a file
f <- system.file("cubi_POL_01_INFORMAZIONI.txt", package = "dcatapchr")
s <- file.size(f)
s
#> [1] 1614

# Create a dcat:byteSize tag
dcat_byteSize(size = s)
#> [1] "<dcat:byteSize rdf:datatype=\"http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#integer\">1614</dcat:byteSize>"

# Remove f and s
rm(f, s)
